name: Not on my shift
description:
Small project made for https://bcgjam.com/project in three days.

You work on Judgment Day Clock. 
Your task is simple - just don't let Judgement Day come!

Minkinag  - gamedesign, narrative
valerii  - music. sounds
MrRohngwald - code, level-design
 ViktorWii - code
blednaya - art
